DialogueFragments.Speaker: Narrator
DialogueFragments.Text: You're sitting at the bus stop on Skovbjerg street.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Narrator
DialogueFragments.Text: It's raining.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Narrator
DialogueFragments.Text: You tried to put together a quick lunchbox in 5 minutes while finishing up a call with your friend, holding the phone between your left ear and shoulder. This strategic manouver backfired, and now you missed the bus and broke your phone.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Narrator
DialogueFragments.Text: *ding*

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Narrator
DialogueFragments.Text: *ding*

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Narrator
DialogueFragments.Text: Well... The speakers still work. It's the most familiar sound in the world. It could wake you up from a deep slumber if it was played at the lowest volume a mile away. You feel each one, just a little bit, like an auditorial papercut.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Narrator
DialogueFragments.Text: You should tend to them in the bus, but now they're left alone, let down.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]"Excuse me?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Huh, she's freezing. Her jacket is way too thin for this weather. She spent too much money on that Kine Linen jacket&#8482, and now must justify she spent it well.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Look at her and smile

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Mhm?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Nice jacket!"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Wait for her to say something

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Just wondering if you had a lighter that i might be able to use?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: It's almost frustrating just how perfect she is. Her hair is perfect, but not uptight. She doesn't need to wear "natural makeup" - she owns her makeup. The clothes aren't branded, but they're stylish and fit perfectly.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: That's only superficial, off course. It matters, but it only really matters in the lack of that something else in the personality; That undescribable, mystical likeable quality.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: ... in more pressing matters, we interacted with her, and she just acknowledged our existence.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: But you already know that.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She has both.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Got a light?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Excuse me?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
Hand her a lighter and say:
"I don't smoke though".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Hand her a lighter and take up a cigarette.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
Smile:
"I have a lighter that you might be able to use".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text:
[A]Say nothing.
Light up your ciggarette, then hers.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text:
[A]"Thanks".
Light up her ciggarette, then yours.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text:
[A]Say nothing.
Light up her ciggarette, then yours.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Inhale.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Exhale.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Exhale

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Smile and exhale a big cloud in her face.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Inhale

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Oh lord all mighty it's like gurgling a bonfire and coughing up a chimney.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: But we're cool. Cool like a...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text:
Whuh... Okay. Keep a rhythm....
We're uhm, we're cool lik-

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Like-- huh- like a refrigerat-

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Cough

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Cough

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Not not cough.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Oh lord all mighty smoking is like gurgling a bonfire and coughing up a chimney.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: But we're cool. Look! She even seems happy- wait, it couldn't be... no no no i cannot handle that righ-

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
[A]"Oh no! I'm so sorry haha".
Pat her on the back and help her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
[A]"Are you okay?".
Pat her on the back and help her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
[A]Smile:
"You don't really like smoking, do you?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Laugh, but kindly.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Laugh in a somewhat mean way.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "I'm fine, just a sore throat. Shouldn't have smoked today".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "it's probably just a ... bad cigarette".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Try to laugh with her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "That's unfortunate. Let's put them away".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Sorry though - let's throw away these cancer-sticks".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Want me to take this away?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "What brand?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Want to try mine?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Mhm?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Well, you know, just bought the cheapest i could find".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Right".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "It's probably best if i just take a little break".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Probably for the best, yeah."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Dont ... worry about me".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]"Let's take it away"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "If you say so".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "... And you're sure?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Why did you just pretend to laugh?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Sorry".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "You don't need to say sorry".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Apology accepted".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Oh yeah, of course".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Yeah".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Cool".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Haha"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "You seem like a really nice kid".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Do you smoke as well?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Take up a cigarette yourself.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "I don´t smoke".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Thanks"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Thanks?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "No! I'm serious!"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Now enjoy your cigarette! I'll pass, never understood smoking."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Yeah. I appreciate it".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Look confused.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Oh, no specific reason".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "It's just, you acted very polite is all".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
[A]Hand on her shoulder:
"Relax".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: " ... anyways, cigarette?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Yeah, yeah of course".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Well... thanks".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Why did you feel you needed to say it, insist it even?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Sorry ... it's nothing ... just a bad day. Feelings are in a sensitive mood."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Nah, i don't smoke".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "It's on me. I was being weird there".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "That sucks".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text:
"Oh don't worry about it -
uhm ... cigarette?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "But something gave you a hint, right?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "As I said, I was being weird there."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Kind of, but .... ".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "My body language indicated nervousness?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "I shouldn't have started with 'excuse me', and instead just asked directly"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "I seemed too intent on making contact with you, instead of being here for the smoke".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "My overly long suggestion for a lighter suggested a lack in my  understanding of implicit language, and hence social and/or intellectual stupidity".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "The polite language and general expression made it seem as if i cared alot about what you think of me, making me appear less casual and self-confident".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Okay, good. Uhm ... cigarette?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "I complimented you?".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Keep looking confused.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Are you seriously upset with me right now?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Nevermind. Sorry. Uhm ... cigarette?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "It's just, you acted very polite is all".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Oh i don't wanna annoy you with the smell, I'll just put it away"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Yeah, it's unhealthy. I should probably just put it away".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "To be honest, i don't smoke either".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Sound thinking".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Doctor couldn't change your mind but me?".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "I really don't mind one bit. I'm a party smoker, i'm used to it".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Thanks".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Same! Not addicted, away it goes".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
[A]Look around and nod, then smile:
"Must be some *wild* parties you go to".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Well, 'social smoker' might be the right term to use".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Ah".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "So the cigarette is just the means to and end?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Well, it's a nice way to start a conversation".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Well...".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "You needed a fool-proof strategy to talk with me".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Well...".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "It just makes things easier" .

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Sorry".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Yeah".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Cool".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Do you do this often?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "A few times yeah".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "No".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "It's alright, i'm just curious".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
[A]Smile:
"I will talk to you."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "No, it's on me. I was being rude there".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Am i kind of a child to you?".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Then uhm ... let's talk".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "No?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "No, don't worry, it's fine! I did. Let's ignore all this".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Don't go home feeling hurt after this."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "It's nothing".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Even the part where i tell you i'm too exhausted for this conversation right now?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "There was no curiosity in that voice."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "I uhm... i don't smoke"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Why?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Okay".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "No?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "No."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
[A]Bow down your head slightly:
"... no?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Okay yes".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Are you hurt?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "I'm fine, thanks".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Well you're not the only one".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Because when you're like me you need to".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "It increases my chances, just slightly".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "It makes me more likeable".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Why do you so badly need these things from us?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Because in the brief moments where i have it, i get so happy, so envious of those that have much more".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "You want me to just lay down and accept that i'm worse than 95% of people?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "How am i to live without ever knowing if anything i do is right or wrong, good or bad, impressive or lame?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Interesting! How would you say you came to be and think in this way?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Hmmm. I've thought about that too. I think it's a combination of many different factors, the bulk of which sit in late childhood and early pre-teens.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Ah. Go on".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "[E]Let's first of all start with the family. I think realized quite quickly that my two siblings - one younger, one older - we're superior to me in different ways.  Everytime we'd try something new, they'd always win"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "But many children have undoubtedly had the same experience. I think for me, my class consciousness appeared first because of this "friend" i had in the neighbourhood.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "It was usually me asking her if she wanted to play. But then one day in the summer she asked me, and i got very happy!"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "But that same day, i walked by her house to buy some groceries for my mom, and i overheard a large and angry discussion she had with her mom".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "She didn't actually like playing with me that much. She thought i was boring and weird or something, i don't really remember. It was her mom that had forced her to play with me out of sympathy.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "The rest of the summer was equally formative. I realized how few friends i really had. Realized there's been birthday parties i probably wasn't invited to."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "But for now, elementary was this still fine. It was *their* fault, right? At least it wasn't *all* mine. And people seemed to like me well enough in class, so i didn't mind too much. Naive me was hoping for a new class in high school to fix all me problems."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "It didn't. The first day is a blur, but i remember sitting down at a table because the other one seemed full, and then no one came over to me.".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [E]"No one picked my table".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [E]"No one picked me".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Don't worry about those things. It's alright".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Yeah, of course".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Good".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Laugh

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "I see".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "But you did a minute ago?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "I lied. I'm sorry".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Haha yeah, it's quite funny".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "What's up?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Let's pretend this never happened".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Do you smoke or do you not smoke?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Okay".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "What's funny?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "It's fine. I'm just very curious here".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "You're not a very good liar".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Nothing"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "You laughed".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "This whole situation, i assume?".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Yeah?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Yeah."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Okay".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "But you were laughing at something particular".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "It was just politeness".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Wow. I genuinely don't know what to belive right now. It's fascinating."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "All you need to know is that i can be kind of awkward. Shall we continue?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Where do you live, what do you do, where were you born, how old are you bla. bla. bla".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Please, indulge me: What's going on here? Spit out the details, give me the truth".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "You look great by the way, i love the jacket".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "True. I'm awful at it. When did you know i didn't smoke?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "I do not smoke".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "The smoking is an excuse to talk."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Then what would you have done if i had said yes?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "I would have pretended to smoke".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
[A]Laugh.
"Honey, doesn't work like that".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "You would do that"?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "A calculated risk".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Probably not".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Well dang, i belive you".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Good".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Yeah, good".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Walk away from the conversation.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "I don't belive you though".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "You still have alot to learn, and that's okay".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Just please stop with this endless irony".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Maybe you stop interpreting everything i say as an evaluation of you?".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "You're speaking to me like I'm your parent."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Does it feel nice, being so happy all the time?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Oh you're so burdened! You have to care about so much!".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "You're in such a great position, and this is how you choose to use it?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Fuck you!"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [E]"No, fuck you!"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [E]"No fuck you!"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Yeah".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "I don't belive you though".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Oh".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "You do smoke".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "I'm cornered here, you got me".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Why did you not just say you didn't feel like smoking?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Why did you not want to smoke with me?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "I think that's besides the point for now. I'm sorry. I lied. It was wrong. Moving on..."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Because i knew how you'd interpret that, stupid".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Because i didn't feel like it".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You know what she's talking about.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "You'd think: She doesn't feel like smoking with me".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "And then you'd be hurt".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "... And you know what?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "I can't be bothered with that."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Not. another. person".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Why?".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "I'm not angry, i just want to understand"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Who the fuck cares!"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "I shouldn't have to explain that!"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Oh, because I'm just not 'smart' enough to realize it?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Everything's not about you!"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "It's my choice to explain".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "There could be a thousand different reasons why i didn't feel like it".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Me!"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Maybe, i had other things to attend to".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Maybe i had just smoked earlier".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Maybe i was just kind of tired" .

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Or maybe ... "

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "In some parallel universe"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "- and you're asking for this yourself -"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "I seemed too intent on making contact with you, instead of being here for the smoke".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "My overly long suggestion for a lighter suggested a lack in my  understanding of implicit language functions, and hence social and/or intellectual stupidity".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "The polite language and general expression made it seem as if i cared alot about what you think of me, making me appear less casual and self-confident".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "No. I saw you".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "I've seen you".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "I've been seeing you, seeing me".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Just maybe ... "

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "My body language indicated nervousness?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "I had a pretty good idea what kind of person you we're, and i didn't want to talk to you?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "I shouldn't have started with 'excuse me', and instead just asked directly"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "... ... I'm sorry".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "... ...  I'm suck a fucking creep."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Honestly it's fine. I don't mind. You're not a creep, you were nervous".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "You weren't stalking me. You just wanted to talk, and you couldn't quite get yourself to do it".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "It's very understandable".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text:
Not looking her in the eyes:
"Thanks".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "It's pathetic".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Look me in the eyes, and listen very closely now."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "The pain of rejection is probably real".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "It's probably strong".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "... But god".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "You're right. I'm sorry to make you feel that way".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "If that's true, then the pain of rejecting is very real aswell".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "You shouldn't have to worry about me like that. I've gone through worse".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "I'm sorry, but i just don't know if i can keep being sorry much longer. Not another person". [END OF BRANCH]

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "It's probably universal".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
"Glad to hear you understand".
[END OF BRANCH]

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "How did you know i was a smoker?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Actually don't answer, i already know".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Avoid eye contact at all costs.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "... I'm really sorry. It was wrong. I can walk away right now if you want me to".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "... I, I was just worried that ... "

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text:
Take a deep breath.
"So...".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "A bit creepy, but understandable. You we're nervous".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "You've been watching me".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Please, stay, I'm enjoying this too much".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
Smile:
"I understand completely what you were trying to do. It's okay".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "But honey, what do you have to offer? My plate is full".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "How could someone who's so nervous they need to mentally rehearse talking to a stranger, multiple times, who's so desperate they really want to make an active effort to talk to this particular stranger, ever make me happy?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
Smile a little more, and look her directly in the eyes:
"You wanted me to like you. You wanted to make sure this went well. Just a little field work".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Truth is, I'm leagues above you. I would never and will never feel validated by anything you do or say".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
Hug her:
"But that's okay. That doesn't mean you're a bad person. It's just fate".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Yeah".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
"Yeah".
[END OF BRANCH]

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Everything alright?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
[A]Keep looking at her.
Keep smiling.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Oh, sorry. Wasn't sure i had your attention".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]Keep waiting for her to say something

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Honey, why are you staring at me?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Don't worry - what's up?".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Do you need something?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Forgot what i even wanted to say haha"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Okay"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: "Well, it happens".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]"Nice meeting you!"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]"You too".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Wait a little bit before saying something to indicate a change in topic and flow of conversation.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Test if she's interested in maintaining this conversation by saying nothing and waiting for her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: In the meantime, let us evaluate the mission so far.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Do we think this is going well?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Totally.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: This is not going well.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: We're watching a disaster unfold before our very eyes.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: I think it's going decently well.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Well, it's nice to hear you do.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: It's actually going great.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: I'll take that as sarcasm.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: I don't think the situation calls for such snarky irony.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: It's going ... decently.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: It's going well!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: (you tell yourself)

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Hell yeah!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: But you're right:

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: I appear quite likeable!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: We should not have pretended to smoke though. Bad idea.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: We might have switched course on smoking too early though. I think she suspects I'm lying.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: I don't think we should go for this smoking trick again though.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: It's weird, because i'm pretty sure she knows im awkward, but i don't really care.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: It's weird, because i'm pretty sure she knows we're awkard, but who cares?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: But she's probably brushed it aside.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: I'm enojyable company, and that's what matters!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Oh, fuck off!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You know...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: At this point, she know's everything she needs to know.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: But let's get the best out of it.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: I mean even if this conversation is nice, what's the point? We already failed what we said out to do.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: It'd be a more productive use of our time and energy to just end the conversation here. Just take up your phone and terminate the conversation.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: I mean there's still things you could learn from the rest of the conversation...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Listen! We talked about not giving up so easily. You face a tiny bit of resistance and decide immediately to quit!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Let's prove that i can do this.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Is it really a better alternative to sit with my phone? It's not like that makes me "happy" exactly.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: At the end of the day, it's impossible to really know what she thinks of me.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Life's a game of probability and uncertainty. You can never truly know someone.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]You can only guess....

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You could not keep up the illusion that you smoked for even seconds

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Christ, you walked over to someone, and pretended to smoke. Then followed it up by saying, no, actually i don't. How weird is that!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She saw right through everything you did.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Actually...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: And why, why did you have to be so insecure as to ask if "anything gave her a clue"?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: That, that was her clue!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You were so nervous that she knew something was wrong from the very first thing you said. She needed to compliment you with the jacket.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: And why can't you talk like normal people? 'A lighter that i might be able to use'.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You just stood there and stared at her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: It was not a good idea to pretend that you smoked. That did not turn out well.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You had to tell her that you lied about smoking.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She saw right through everything you did.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Why did you ask if "anything gave her a clue"?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: That, that was her clue!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: What was that thing about the jacket also? Did we do something wrong from the start?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: I need to be more casual also. 'A lighter that i might be able to use'.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You froze completely in the start. You just stared at her. Must have been weird.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She seems nice!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She seems ... decent.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Screw her, though.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She's really focusing on the conversation instead of staring at her phone.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: And she doesn't give these constant, rude demeaning looks.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She doesn't need to hide feelings of disgust or superiority behind sarcasm.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: It's just ... her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]Why.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Why what?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: It's probably nothing.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: What does she gain by this?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She's giving me so much, and...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: ... and yet i can't keep thinking...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: That i could never give that back.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Yeah.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: That kindness is the only reason she's like this.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She isn't enjoying this.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She knows very well how awkward i am.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Anyways...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: If she doesn't care, then why should we care about her!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She thinks she's just so much better!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She probably hasn't faced even the tiniest bit of rejection her whole life!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She's been on top, looking down on everyone else;

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Now even strangers have to "prove their worth" to her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: At the end of the day, she's just afraid.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She hates herself.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She hates herself so much that she needs someone below her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She hates how utterly fucking uninteresting she is.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Hates her lack of skills, lack of interests, lack of opinions, lack of any idea of what to do with her life.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She needs her own companions of equally uninteresting people, because anything else would scare her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She always looks for signs when she meets someone. Signs that the person cares about something.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: And that's what she makes them feel bad about. What she makes them think is cringe.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Of course, she's too self-aware to actually be a "bully", so she hides the whole act behind a thick veneer of sarcasm and irony.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She never explicitly said those parts of you were cringe. She only implied they were "funny".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She's a pathetic individual like so many others.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]Is what i wish i could tell myself.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Maybe she's just a normal person.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Is that good?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Are you good enough for normal?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Definitely not unlikeable.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: That's good.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Enough!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: All the people that like you are extra-ordinarily kind.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: The "average" person still doesn't like you.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: And that's what we're here today to change!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: But she might!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: But she might not be average!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: So let's get the best out of it.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: If we can seem likeable to a "normal" person, then I'd consider that a smashing success! She's the perfect subject to test ourselves.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Yeah, it's good.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: So let's go out there and succeed!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: ... Yeah.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Still ...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: ... is that it?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: That's all it was, the whole time?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: I guess i had just expected ...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]Something more.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She's fading away,

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She might still be!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You just need more data!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: and the bridge across the river is crumbling.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Reach for the pocket.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: One more chance.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Okay:

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Let's go for it.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Talk to her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Change course: Say nothing, and see if she takes the bait.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I have a hard time putting a finger on her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's hard to put a finger on her exactly.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Hmmmm.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You know, she's probably a really nice person.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You already know everything you need to know here.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You've got to admit it's intriguing

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: The girl is clearly nervous.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: But she's trying.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Trying to the point of lying if it's beneficial.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She'll easily go back on her lies and contradict herself if it means avoiding conflict though.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Honestly, i still don't know with certainty if she's a smoker or not.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Even though it should be the opposite, one has to admit: There's something truthful, authentic about it.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She's simply not very good at this act.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's cracking and breaking down right in front of you.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: This is the one thing you're not supposed to see:

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's fine seeing the actor playing out a role.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's also fine seeing the actor as "themselves".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: But we never get to see the actor play out an awful, unauthentic performance. What would they gain from that?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's a situation beyond their control. A part of themselves they'd do everything to hide.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's that moment in front of the crowd. Everything in the theater is covered in darkness as one spotlight shines down on our star of the show. And they stare out at this shadowy, faceless mass of people, and know, that everyone in here knows, they don't know what they're doing. And they scramble and panic left and right for something to hang onto, and they reach you, and they see, that you see

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: That's the impression i get from her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: That's what i want to see from her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She seems pretty nervous.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: And she doesn't seem to have any deep moral issues with lying either.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: But there's something likeable about her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's like ...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: But there's something I like about her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: No one told her to do this.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's hard to know what exactly she wants, and maybe she doesn't know either.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Watching a car crash.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Well, what do I know?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Desperate for validation, not willing to take many risks or tell anything interesting.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She's the type that sits with her phone at the party.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: For all that you know she could be a fine human being, but i can't see what there is to gain by this conversation.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Sorry. It's a shitty, lame position to take, but i can't keep this up forever.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Take up your phone

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Say nothing, give her an extra chance if she tries.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: If there's anyone who's done something wrong in this scenario, it's you.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You had a good reason to "throw her off course".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: This "authenticity" you attempt to seek by doing it is purely selfish.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: That doesn't make it bad.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: They're people, not subjects.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Maybe it could actually help her?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She was practically following a flowchart!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Does that excuse hurting someone?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It doesn't have to involve hurting anyone. Nothing wrong with putting someone slightly out of their comfort zone, no?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: A little uncertainty is healthy.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It felt like she like purposefully backed out of any situation she wasn't certain of what to do in.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I know.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You do?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]Mhm.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's your approach to doing it that's the problem.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Always remember the human.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I'm helping her grow!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Just don't treat her like a toy. She wants and she feels.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: This is an odd one.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: What to think?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She's utterly normal.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She's utterly interesting.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She's utterly uninteresting.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: But to be fair: What's the difference between "normal" and uninteresting?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Watch out! We got a badass in here!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Maybe uninteresting is just "exceptionally normal"?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Maybe what's "normal" is to be a "normal" amount of interesting?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: And she's even more bad when she uses sarcasm!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: So "normal" describes some arbitrary set of characteristics and qualities we deem "normal", and she adheres to those very closely?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Isn't that an oxymoron?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: So the average person has very little to offer beyond their normality, but she has even less?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: By being closer to this person than most people, she becomes again interesting.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She's all the things that humans share, and only those things.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: That is, in some way, kind of beautiful!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: So she has nothing unique to offer?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: So "utterly uninteresting" is "utterly exceptionally normal". Then they're the same things!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: So which is it: Is the glass then half full or half empty?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's half full.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's half empty.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Anyways...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She's is not a normal amount of interesting.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She is a normal amount of interesting.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: But maybe this talk of "interesting" and "uninteresting" is bogus to begin with?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It becomes something you have, something to obtain: "To be interesting".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: We should instead frame this discussion about authenticity.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: So to ask again:

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Did this girl appear to "act authentically?"

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Yes.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: No.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Something in between.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: That's a false dichotomy!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Okay...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: That's a false trichotomy!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: We have to dig deeper.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: A typical example of "inauthentic acting" would be someone lying about themselves and what they believe in for the purpose of "fitting in".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: But this word "inauthentic" is infantilizing and stupid; She or he is simply acting a certain way to accomplish a certain goal they seek.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: So maybe a real judgement requires some deeper evaluation of what drives a person.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She's driven by a desire for social recognition.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She is driven by a desire to just pass the fucking time, and maybe appreciates your company?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She's driven by a desire to confess her love.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She is driven by a desire to spread out the message of our lord and saviour Jesus Christ.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: So you should probably just act nicely.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: So you need more data to really know.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It hard to make a final judgment already, but...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It feels like she isn't really reacting to you. It's like she's going through a flowchart, and on her end you're a "model universal simplified person".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I guess there isn't too much to say then?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Just a normal person on a normal day.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: And a flowchart means that it's about what she wants to get out of this. Not you.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It feels like she's perfectly in control to avoid any situations that may be undesirable. Any situations that may be awkward.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She's too good at not being awkward.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: What i want to get out of this?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]To see something new and be interested in life for a moment.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: But then in the end there's nothing left.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She's blown away all "spice" in the process.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Because her awkwardness is all she is.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: What is going on

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I want to understand this person.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Yeah.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: But with great power comes great responsibility.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You have a duty to fulfil.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Listen, you.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You're probably thinking about taking up your phone and pretending it isn't rude.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]So?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Why is this duty mine?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: A duty to who?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Because people dream to be like you.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Those in need of help.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: That's a stupid dream!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: That isn't my fault!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: What kind of help?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Even if they're not asking for it?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Then you have no pride.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: And I'm proud of that!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I. Did. Nothing!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Then you have no shame.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I don't deserve any of it.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: They can always find someone else.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]No more!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Proud never to have accomplished anything?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I don't need them!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I built this!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Because there's really nothing special about you.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: But what are you without your throne, monarch?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: What's your dream?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: That's just a societal construct!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I want to travel the world!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You care about politics now?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Find yourself now, for only 800$!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I'm only 21!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I'm trying!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Next year you'll figure it out, i promise!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You never really tried.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I'll meet new, different kind of people!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I'll learn to be independent by travelling alone!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: No one will ever figure it out for you.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: And you'll be so fucking bored.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Your genes built this.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: When was the last time you spent even a day alone?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Even if they're not asking for it.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You know, someone better than them?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: But i never really fix their problems!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: But sometimes they're not even trying!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Then you be the bearer of bad news.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: That girl quit class because of me!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You can't fix someone who doesn't want to be fixed!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You enjoyed writing that. It flew so naturally out of your fingers.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Then let them suffer.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You can only remove the symptoms, never the cause.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I just make them dependent on me.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's better than nothing?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Because it was never about helping them.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Is it?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I'm not better than them.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's their insistence on validation!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Do you enjoy their company?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I'm not better than them!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Then what are you?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: They're better in many other ways!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: That's never gonna find them true happiness. The kind of joy you feel.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You're nothing but a tragic slave to their evil demands!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: They give me nothing!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It would be rude to back out now!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You never asked.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Don't worry so much. They'll find someone else.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: them.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]I want to see them do something unexpected.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: And then see them do the same thing again.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]I want to find something, someone interesting.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: And destroy them.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]I want to learn from this person.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: And learn nothing in the process

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [X] I want this person to like me

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: And make sure they understand that i don't care.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: This makes no sense because

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: what is being accomplished by all this?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: what is right and wrong to say here?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: what made it all go wrong?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: The answer is nothing.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I just need to figure out

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: But...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: There is no answer.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I want to keep talking to her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I mean

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: might as well use the time for something right?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Right.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Not right.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Let's keep this going a few minutes more.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Why bother small-talking to normal people?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Being nice, maybe?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's a comforting presence of mutual respect and appreciation.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Yeah! Why bother!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: They're normal, they won't be hurt if you ignore them.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Yeah, don't be an asshole.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: They only care about things to a moderate degree.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Talk to her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: So...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Let's not talk to her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Ah to hell with it.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Yeah. A kind of ritual.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It doesn't make sense.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Who's desperate enough to need and or enjoy that?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: So:

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Begin anew the ritual.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Let's just

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Call it a day

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Talk to her anyways.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Yeah, do that.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I won't waste my time anymore!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: In this world, there's no time for silly games! We're above that!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I'll seek out only the best of the best.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: A toast to better smalltalk hence forward, my compatriot!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: I don't know who's choice it is.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Talk to her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Don't bother.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: And then

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You've started growing pessimistic lately.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You've started noticing patterns

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Different faces, but the same acts over and over again.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Within 10 seconds, you know someone

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's a cynical position, but there's just too many people in your life at this point. You need these generalizations.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: The same people are gonna get black-out drunk

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: The same people are gonna bring up the same kind of drama

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: The same people are gonna keep to themselves and their phones

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: And the same people are gonna leave early, because really, is this worth the hangover?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: But maybe you'll meet someone interesting and truthful tonight?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Anyways.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: The bus is late, so we have about 15 minutes to waste.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: What to do?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Maybe you'll see something real?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: This is it! This is what we've been waiting for:

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Coming up in 3 ...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: There are no notifications on your phone.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You turn it off and check once again just to be sure.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You swipe around and go into apps in desperation.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You wait, and repeat ad nauseam.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: It is the definition of nothing,

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: this thing you're doing.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Girls that binge shows for hours-on-end are athletes.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: And gamers seem, suddenly, a less appalling demographic.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Even Jane, Jane who frequents long, summer naps, is acting with more intent, focus and commitment than you.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She loves sleeping.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You sit tensely and wait.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You try to look at her face without her noticing.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: God. Just what is that cryptic expression hiding?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Girl, speak up!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Damn it, make yourself clear,

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: take a stance, tell me what you're thinking.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Are you thinking about anything at all?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text:
Someone asking about how it's going.

Someone sharing something with "non-important" with you, just because they like you.

Someone mentioning you (maybe a tag, maybe just someone mentioning you in a conversation they had with someone else)

Someone inviting you to something

The likes on some post you made.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Huh, i guess that's to be expected.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You get a little nervous, you're challenged a tiny bit, just quit, don't even bother!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Why help someone who isn't even trying to help themselves?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Of course people are gonna choose to be with someone more sociable, someone more fun.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's not my responsibility!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You just cling to me like a parasite,

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You have nothing to give in return.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: That's why I'll always be higher.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Forever above you in this invisible, social hierarchy.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She's telling me: I don't want to keep talking with you.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: But something is telling me,

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: she does.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Let's do a good thing today.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: That shouldn't be your responsibility to know.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: And why do you have such judgement?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: We've all seen this exact person before.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Why is my gut-feeling not good enough?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She just needs a little nudge.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She's a bit scared.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's her own fault.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Let's nudge her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Let's help her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She's not basing her decisions on hard science either.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You shouldn't push people.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You need to push people, just a little.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's not up for me to decide.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She's made her choice.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Nothing will change today.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's exhausting.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Let's just tell her something basic.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Something intrepidly dull.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Something along the lines of...

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]"Man, hangovers are the worst".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: The silence between you two is slowly lowering it's volume. Soon, it is officially cancelled, never to be thought of again.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: You lean your head back slightly against the glass pane,

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: and you relax.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: and you make this cancellation official: You pull up your phone.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: She seems quite nervous.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Oh well.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You can always try again another time.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: This was bound to happen.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Can you?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Why bother with this one?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Yeah.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: No

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You're slowly running out.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Not getting better.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Spend your best already.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Don't think too much about it.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Another place, another person.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Another time.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: A different time.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You're of a different kind.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Fundamentally.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: She's the normal one here.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: The problem is you.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]It's just you.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: No! It didn't work!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Is she not interested in talking with me?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Yes.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Maybe.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: No.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: I just don't wanna be annoying!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You don't want to feel pain*.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Who cares if someone rude thinks you're annoying?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You want to live life in a protective bubble, yet you expect people to break through and love you.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: It isn't exactly a crime what you're doing!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: I'm sorry.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You're oversimplifying the situation!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: This is so much more fundamental than ... fucking jumping the 5 meter beam!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: This psychological torment runs much deeper than burning your fingers on a hot stove!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: So many wasted years

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: I'm pathetic. I never want to risk anything.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: There's something wrong with me, okay. I'll figure it out.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: I'll figure out what's wrong with me eventually!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Shut the fuck up, would you?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: moments missed

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: all for that.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Flip the switch and push the button.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]... Eventually!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [E][X]Eventually!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X][E]Eventually!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Who the fuck are you even talking to!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Try the person next to you instead.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]Okay. Let's do this.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Okay.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]Let's do this!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: But there's a limit to that argument! There's annoying, and there's really annoying.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Just think of all the bothersome people you've met and seen your whole life.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
