DialogueFragments.Text: You've watched them and you've thought: I am glad I'm better than that.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: How could you ever know

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: that you are not that?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You could take anything to an extreme.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You just need some way to be sure.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: To verify, to make certain, some higher judge to call the shots.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Something, anything

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: that isn't you.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Talk to her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Don't talk to her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Yeah, might as well just try again another time.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: No way this path is going down well.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Okay, she didn't take the bait.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Well, too bad.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Fuck fuck fuck!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]Shit!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]Okay, think.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Think what?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Don't think about thinking!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]Damage control!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Where are you taking the bus to? I'm going to some friends."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Where are you taking the bus to? I'm going to a party."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Where are you taking the bus to? I've got some work-related matters."

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: INTERMISSION: THE DEMO ENDS HERE!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Okay

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Seriously.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: THANK YOU FOR PLAYING!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: YES!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Yup, theyy suck, haha lol,

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: INTERMISSION: THE DEMO ENDS HERE!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Okay

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Seriously.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: THANK YOU FOR PLAYING!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: YES!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [A]No turning back now!

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Raindrops hit you directly in the eyes, and the muscles in your face shiver.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It hurts to stare like this.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It hurts to smile like this.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]But you keep at it.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You stand there, leaning down slightly, looking at her.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: You're paralysed, transfixed in a permanent state of confusion.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]Keep being confused.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Hours turn to days and days turn to months.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: The two of you are small celebrities at this point.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: People on the bus stop by with food.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: Are you in control of this phenomenon, or is it controlling you?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Statues have been erected in your honour.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: But hell, was this even necessary?

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: Are this point, you're no different.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]Because you keep on smiling.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]No less confused.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: It's been a long time since you turned to dust.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: People stopped giving you food. They liked the statues more.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: The climate crisis and global political tensions caused a radical fall and rebirth of the world order, but no one dared destroy these statues.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: To this day, the act continues on telepathically.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]Eternally confused.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Sofie
DialogueFragments.Text: [X]Eternally smiling.

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Narrator
DialogueFragments.Text:
And everyone lived happily ever after.
[END OF BRANCH].

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Thanks".

DialogueFragments.Speaker: Klara
DialogueFragments.Text: "Thanks?".
